ðŸ“– Summary: The CDImage repository provides a tool for burning visible pictures onto the surface of a compact disc. It includes a GUI with a visual preview mode and utilizes coordinate conversion code inspired by previous similar projects. The project has been ported to Qt6 and a Windows binary build is available, offering a way to create unique, visually customized CDs.
